text: (Abo abaabaawukanako ku lutalo lwe Tabuk) bajja kubeetondera (nga balimba), bwe munaaba muzzeeyo gye bali bagambe (gwe Nabbi Muhammad) nti temwetonda tetujja kukkiriza kwetonda kwa mmwe, anti mazima Katonda yatutegeeza ebibakwatako, Katonda ajja kulaba ebikolwa bya mmwe n'omubakawe ajja kubiraba, oluvanyuma muli baakuzzibwa eri omumanyi w'ebyekwese n'ebyolwatu, olwo nno Katonda alyoke abategeeze ebyo bye mwali mukola (ku nsi)
